messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] New to Group (North Dakota)
messages.msgSnippet: -=-I ve been new to unschooling since last May, but just recently new to North Dakota. I was wondering if there are any other unschooling families on here in
messages.messageBody:
-=-I've been new to unschooling since last May, but just recently new to North Dakota. I was wondering if there are any other unschooling families on here in North Dakota ( we are by the Montana border). Sorry for the discretion, North Dakota homeschooling laws just have me a bit concerned with unschooling. -=-

Though someone might pop up here and give you some local info, this isn't really a place to ask.

http://sandradodd.com/world

Ask in neighboring states if your state isn't listed. Read the laws and understand them as well as you can. Don't use the HSLDA site; they like to scare people.

http://sandradodd.com/unschoolingcurriculum
That's overkill for most juristictions, but might give you confidence and ideas.

There will be a symposium in Minneapolis in early May. You might meet people there to stay in contact with, maybe.
http://allunschoolingminnesota2013.blogspot.com

I have ten registrations already. There's a water park in the hotel, and tickets come with rooms.

Sandra




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
